content: After his coronation, Dimitri assumed the throne of the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus and spent his life ruling justly over FÃ³dlan. At his side every step of the way was his queen, Annette, whose wisdom provided not only reliable counsel, but a whole assortment of revolutionary policies. The royal couple's sincere approach to governance earned them widespread acclaim, securing their line as a dynasty that lasted for generations to come. Their married life was said to be full of love and cheer.
